title: How Many Calories in a Little Caesars Pizza Slice?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a little caesars pizza slice, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and variations for cheese or pepperoni.
h1: How Many Calories in a Little Caesars Pizza Slice?
assumptions: One slice (1/8th) from a large Classic Cheese Pizza; round crust, standard toppings, no extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by pizza type, size, crust style, toppings, and preparation. Check Little Caesars nutritional info for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A slice of Little Caesars Classic Cheese Pizza contains about 280 calories and 12 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a little caesars pizza slice with pepperoni?
faqs.a: About 300 calories for a pepperoni slice from a large Classic Pepperoni Pizza.

faqs.q: What's the sodium content in a Little Caesars cheese slice?
faqs.a: Approximately 560 mg of sodium per slice.

faqs.q: How much protein is in a Little Caesars pizza slice?
faqs.a: Around 12 g of protein per cheese slice.

faqs.q: Do Little Caesars slices have trans fats?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat per slice in their classic pizzas.

faqs.q: How do calories change with different crusts at Little Caesars?
faqs.a: Thin crust reduces calories by ~50 per slice; Detroit-style deep dish increases them by ~100.
